mapper.select: select * from product WHERE NAME LIKE "%#{name}%"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name, kind, price, content, detail, image) VALUES (#{name}, #{kind}, #{price}, #{content}, #{detail}, #{image})
mapper.update: update product set name = #{name}, kind = #{kind}, price = #{price}, content = #{content}, detail = #{detail}, image = #{image} where prodnum = #{prodnum}
